sense.def:
Z izrazom
in relation to
pri primerjanju dveh stvari uvedemo drugo od teh dveh stvari.

seg.quote: Wages are very low in relation to the cost of living.

sense.def:
The relation of one thing to another
je povezava med dvema stvarema.

seg.quote: She argued that literature has no relation to reality.

sense.def:
One's relations
so člani posameznikove družine.

seg.quote: I was a distant relation of her husband.

sense.def:
Relations between people or groups
so stiki med ljudmi ali skupinami ljudmi in način, kako se vedejo drug do drugega.

seg.quote: The unions should have close relations with management.
